## M-6 Catwalk Safety Upgrades

### Request for Proposal (RFP)

#### Project Information

* Project Title: M-6 Catwalk Safety Upgrades
* Project Location: National Research Council Canada, 1200 Montreal Road, Ottawa
* Project Description: The National Research Council Canada has a requirement for the repair of catwalks, toe boards, guardrails, and the installation of a new travel restraint system and lead abatement in Building M-6.

#### Evaluation Criteria

The bid will be evaluated based on the following mandatory criteria:

* The Proponent must have a minimum of ten (10) years' experience as a general contractor providing construction services comparable to this tender.
* The Proponent must supply the CV for the proposed company construction site supervisor.
* The Proponent must supply the CV for the proposed company project manager.

#### Mandatory Site Visit

The bidder is required to attend one of the site visits at the designated date and time. Failure to do so will result in the bidder being considered non-responsive.

#### Tendering Requirements

The Contractor must hold a valid Designated Organization Screening (DOS) issued by the Canadian Industrial Security Directorate (CISD), Public Works Government Services Canada.

#### Security Clearance Requirements

The Contractor and all subcontractors must hold a valid RELIABILITY STATUS, granted or approved by CISD/PWGSC.

#### Dispute Resolution

In the event of a dispute, the parties agree to make every reasonable effort to settle amicably through negotiations between the parties' representatives authorized to settle.

#### Other Requirements

* The Contractor must obtain a valid Workplace Safety and Insurance Board (WSIB) certificate.
* The Contractor must comply with the provisions of the Security Requirements Checklist and the Industrial Security Manual.

#### Notice Information

* Notice Type: Request for Proposal
* Closing Date: February 28, 2023, 2:00 pm
* Contact Information:
	+ Contact Person: Tania Backes
	+ Email: tania.backes@nrc-cnrc.gc.ca
	+ Phone: 613-410-3834

#### Attachments

* Tender package (English)
* Tender package (French)
* Drawings (English)
* Drawings (French)
